001package org.nasdanika.graph.processor.emf;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.InputStreamReader;
006import java.io.Reader;
007import java.net.URL;
008import java.nio.charset.Charset;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.Collections;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Map.Entry;
015import java.util.function.Consumer;
016
017import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
018import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass;
019import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
020import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EReference;
021import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature;
022import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
023import org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter;
024import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
025import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
026import org.nasdanika.common.PropertySource;
027import org.nasdanika.graph.Connection;
028import org.nasdanika.graph.Element;
029import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.ConnectionProcessorConfig;
030import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.NodeProcessorConfig;
031import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.ProcessorConfig;
032import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.ProcessorInfo;
033import org.nasdanika.persistence.ConfigurationException;
034import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
035import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
036import org.nasdanika.persistence.MarkerImpl;
037import org.springframework.expression.EvaluationContext;
038import org.springframework.expression.EvaluationException;
039import org.springframework.expression.Expression;
040import org.springframework.expression.ExpressionParser;
041import org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpressionParser;
042import org.springframework.expression.spel.support.StandardEvaluationContext;
043import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
044
045/**
046 * Resolves references from properties.
047 * @author Pavel
048 *
049 */
050public abstract class PropertySourceEObjectFactory<T extends EObject, P extends SemanticProcessor<T>> extends AbstractEObjectFactory<T,P> {
051        
052        protected String getPropertyValue(org.nasdanika.graph.Element element, String propertyName) {
053                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(propertyName) && element instanceof PropertySource) {
054                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
055                        PropertySource<Object,?> propertySource = (PropertySource<Object,?>) element;
056                        for (String propertyPrefix: getPropertyPrefixes()) {
057                                Object propertyValue = propertySource.getProperty(propertyPrefix + propertyName);
058                                if (propertyValue instanceof String && !org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank((String) propertyValue)) {
059                                        return (String) propertyValue;
060                                }
061                        }
062                }
063                return null;
064        }
065        
066        /**
067         * Prefixes added to property names. Override to implement namespacing of properties for elements with multiple semantic mappings. 
068         * Multiple prefixes may be used for profiles.
069         * For example, an element may have one mapping for documentation, another for code generation, and one more for status updates - pulling runtime information from monitoring systems and updating diagram elements with health status. 
070         * @return This implementation returns a singleton list of an empty string;
071         */
072        protected List<String> getPropertyPrefixes() {
073                return Collections.singletonList("");
074        }
075        
076        // Loading spec
077
078        /**
079         * Base URI for resolving spec references. This implementation returns null.
080         * @return
081         */
082        protected abstract URI getBaseURI();
083        
084        @Override
085        protected Collection<T> createSemanticElements(ProcessorConfig<P> config, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
086                String spec = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSpecPropertyName());
087                String specFormat = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSpecFormatPropertyName());
088                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(spec)) {
089                        return load(spec, specFormat, getBaseURI(), config, getLoadingContext(config, progressMonitor), progressMonitor);
090                }
091                                
092                // Spec URI
093                String specUriStr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSpecUriPropertyName());
094                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(specUriStr)) {
095                        URI specURI = URI.createURI(specUriStr);
096                        if (specURI.isRelative()) {
097                                URI baseURI = getBaseURI();
098                                if (baseURI != null && !baseURI.isRelative() && baseURI.isHierarchical()) {
099                                        specURI = specURI.resolve(baseURI);
100                                }
101                        }
102                        return load(specURI, specFormat, config, getLoadingContext(config, progressMonitor), progressMonitor);
103                }               
104                
105                // Semantic URI
106                String semanticUriStr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSemanticUriPropertyName());
107                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(semanticUriStr)) {
108                        URI semanticURI = URI.createURI(semanticUriStr);
109                        if (semanticURI.isRelative()) {
110                                URI baseURI = getBaseURI();
111                                if (baseURI != null && !baseURI.isRelative() && baseURI.isHierarchical()) {
112                                        semanticURI = semanticURI.resolve(baseURI);
113                                }
114                        }
115                        return load(semanticURI, specFormat, config, getLoadingContext(config, progressMonitor), progressMonitor);
116                }
117                                
118                return Collections.emptyList();
119        }
120        
121        /**
122         * Override to create a context to be used for semantic element loading.
123         * @param config
124         * @param progressMonitor
125         * @return
126         */
127        protected Context getLoadingContext(ProcessorConfig<P> config, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
128                return Context.EMPTY_CONTEXT;
129        }
130
131        /**
132         * Loads semantic element from a URI
133         * @return
134         */
135        protected Collection<T> load(URI specURI, String specFormat, ProcessorConfig<P> config, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
136                try {
137                        URL specUrl = new URL(specURI.toString());
138                        return load(specUrl, specFormat, config, context, progressMonitor);                             
139                } catch (IOException e) {
140                        throw new NasdanikaException("Error loading specification from specification URI " + specURI, e);
141                }                       
142        }       
143        
144        /**
145         * Loads semantic element from a URL
146         * @return
147         */
148        protected Collection<T> load(URL url, String specFormat, ProcessorConfig<P> config, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {
149                return load(url.openStream(), specFormat, URI.createURI(url.toString()), config, context, progressMonitor);
150        }
151        
152        /**
153         * Loads semantic element from an input stream.
154         * @return
155         */
156        protected Collection<T> load(InputStream inputStream, String specFormat, URI base, ProcessorConfig<P> config, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {
157                try (Reader reader = new InputStreamReader(inputStream, getCharset())) {
158                        return load(DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.toString(reader), specFormat, base, config, context, progressMonitor);
159                }               
160        }
161        
162        /**
163         * Loads semantic element from an input stream.
164         * @return
165         */
166        protected Collection<T> load(Reader reader, String specFormat, URI base, ProcessorConfig<P> config, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) throws IOException {
167                return load(DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.toString(reader), specFormat, base, config, context, progressMonitor);
168        }       
169        
170        /**
171         * Override to customize charset.
172         * @return
173         */
174        protected Charset getCharset() {
175                return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
176        }       
177        
178        /**
179         * Loads semantic element from a string specification.
180         * @param spec Semantic element specification.
181         * @param specBase Base URI for resolving relative URI's.
182         * @return
183         */
184        protected abstract Collection<T> load(String spec, String specFormat, URI specBase, ProcessorConfig<P> config, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor);
185                
186        protected String getSpecPropertyName() {
187                return "spec";
188        }
189        
190        protected String getSpecUriPropertyName() {
191                return "spec-uri";
192        }               
193        
194        protected String getSemanticUriPropertyName() {
195                return "semantic-uri";
196        }               
197        
198        /**
199         * Specification format (MIME type). E.g. text/yaml or application/json. It is used to load specification. 
200         * @return
201         */
202        protected String getSpecFormatPropertyName() {
203                return "spec-format";
204        }                       
205
206        // Child
207        /**
208         * Property name of the parent's reference to inject child into 
209         * @return
210         */
211        protected String getChildReferencePropertyName() {
212                return "child-reference";
213        }
214        
215        protected Marked getMarked(ProcessorConfig<P> config) {
216                Element element = config.getElement();
217                if (element instanceof Marked) {
218                        return (Marked) element;
219                }
220                return new Marked() {
221
222                        @Override
223                        public List<? extends Marker> getMarkers() {
224                                return Collections.singletonList(new MarkerImpl(null, String.valueOf(config.getElement())));
225                        }
226                        
227                };
228        }
229
230        @Override
231        protected EReference getChildReference(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, T semanticElement, ProcessorInfo<P> parentProcessorInfo, T parentSemanticElement) {
232                if (parentSemanticElement == null || config == null) {
233                        return null;
234                }
235                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getChildReferencePropertyName());
236                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
237                        return null;
238                }
239                EClass eClass = parentSemanticElement.eClass();
240                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
241                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
242                        return (EReference) ref;
243                }
244                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
245        }
246        
247        // Parent
248        protected String getParentReferencePropertyName() {
249                return "parent-reference";
250        }
251
252        @Override
253        protected EReference getParentReference(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, T semanticElement,      ProcessorInfo<P> parentProcessorInfo, T parentSemanticElement) {
254                if (config == null) {
255                        return null;
256                }
257                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getParentReferencePropertyName());
258                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
259                        return null;
260                }
261                
262                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
263                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
264                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
265                        return (EReference) ref;
266                }
267                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
268        }       
269        
270        protected String getParentInjectorPropertyName() {
271                return "parent-injector";
272        }
273        
274        @Override
275        protected void setParent(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, ProcessorInfo<P> parentProcessorInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, Consumer<Throwable> failureConsumer) {
276                super.setParent(config, processor, parentProcessorInfo, progressMonitor, failureConsumer);
277                if (config != null) {
278                        String expr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getParentInjectorPropertyName());
279                        P parentProcessor = parentProcessorInfo.getProcessor();
280                        if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr) && processor != null && parentProcessor != null) {
281                                for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
282                                        for (T parentSemanticElement: parentProcessor.getSemanticElements()) {
283                                                ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
284                                                Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
285                                                EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
286                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
287                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
288                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentElement", parentProcessorInfo.getConfig().getElement());                   
289                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentProcessor", parentProcessor);
290                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentSemanticElement", parentSemanticElement);
291                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentConfig", parentProcessorInfo.getConfig());                 
292                                                exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);                                       
293                                        }
294                                }
295                        }
296                }
297        }
298        
299        protected EvaluationContext createEvaluationContext() {
300                return new StandardEvaluationContext();
301        }       
302                
303        // Source
304        protected String getSourceReferencePropertyName() {
305                return "source-reference";
306        }
307        
308        @Override
309        protected EReference getSourceReference(ConnectionProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, T semanticElement, ProcessorInfo<P> sourceProcessorInfo, T sourceSemanticElement) {
310                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSourceReferencePropertyName());
311                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
312                        return null;
313                }
314                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
315                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
316                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
317                        return (EReference) ref;
318                }
319                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
320        }
321        
322        protected String getSourceInjectorPropertyName() {
323                return "source-injector";
324        }
325        
326        @Override
327        protected void setSource(ConnectionProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor,  ProcessorInfo<P> sourceProcessorInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
328                super.setSource(config, processor, sourceProcessorInfo, progressMonitor);
329                String expr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getSourceInjectorPropertyName());
330                P sourceProcessor = sourceProcessorInfo.getProcessor();
331                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr) && processor != null && sourceProcessor != null) {
332                        for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
333                                for (T sourceSemanticElement: sourceProcessor.getSemanticElements()) {
334                                        ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
335                                        Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
336                                        EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
337                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
338                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
339                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("sourceProcessor", sourceProcessor);
340                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("sourceSemanticElement", sourceSemanticElement);
341                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("sourceConfig", sourceProcessorInfo.getConfig());                 
342                                        exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);                                       
343                                }
344                        }
345                }
346        }
347        
348        // Target
349        protected String getTargetReferencePropertyName() {
350                return "target-reference";
351        }
352
353        @Override
354        protected EReference getTargetReference(ConnectionProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, T semanticElement, ProcessorInfo<P> targetProcessorInfo, T targetSemanticElement) {
355                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getTargetReferencePropertyName());
356                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
357                        return null;
358                }
359                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
360                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
361                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
362                        return (EReference) ref;
363                }
364                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
365        }
366        
367        protected String getTargetInjectorPropertyName() {
368                return "target-injector";
369        }
370        
371        @Override
372        protected void setTarget(ConnectionProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, ProcessorInfo<P> targetProcessorInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
373                super.setTarget(config, processor, targetProcessorInfo, progressMonitor);               
374                String expr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getTargetInjectorPropertyName());
375                P targetProcessor = targetProcessorInfo.getProcessor();
376                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr) && processor != null && targetProcessor != null) {
377                        for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
378                                for (T targetSemanticElement: targetProcessor.getSemanticElements()) {
379                                        ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
380                                        Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
381                                        EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
382                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
383                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
384                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("targetProcessor", targetProcessor);
385                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("targetSemanticElement", targetSemanticElement);
386                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("targetConfig", targetProcessorInfo.getConfig());                 
387                                        exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);
388                                }
389                        }
390                }
391        }
392        
393        // Incoming
394        protected String getIncomingReferencePropertyName() {
395                return "incoming-reference";
396        }
397        
398        @Override
399        protected EReference getIncomingReference(NodeProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, T semanticElement, Connection connection, ProcessorInfo<P> incomingProcessorInfo, T incomingSemanticElement) {
400                String value = getPropertyValue(connection, getIncomingReferencePropertyName());
401                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
402                        return null;
403                }
404                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
405                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
406                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
407                        return (EReference) ref;
408                }
409                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
410        }
411        
412        protected String getIncomingInjectorPropertyName() {
413                return "incoming-injector";
414        }
415        
416        @Override
417        protected void setIncoming(NodeProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor,      Connection connection, ProcessorInfo<P> incomingProcessorInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
418                super.setIncoming(config, processor, connection, incomingProcessorInfo, progressMonitor);
419                String expr = getPropertyValue(connection, getIncomingInjectorPropertyName());
420                P incomingProcessor = incomingProcessorInfo.getProcessor();
421                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr) && processor != null && incomingProcessor != null) {
422                        for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
423                                for (T incomingSemanticElement: incomingProcessor.getSemanticElements()) {
424                                        ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
425                                        Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
426                                        EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
427                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
428                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
429                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("connection", connection);
430                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("incomingProcessor", incomingProcessor);
431                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("incomingSemanticElement", incomingSemanticElement);
432                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("incomingConfig", incomingProcessorInfo.getConfig());                     
433                                        exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);
434                                }
435                        }
436                }
437        }
438        
439        // Outgoing
440        protected String getOutgoingReferencePropertyName() {
441                return "outgoing-reference";
442        }
443        
444        @Override
445        protected EReference getOutgoingReference(NodeProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, T semanticElement, Connection connection, ProcessorInfo<P> outgoingProcessorInfo, T outgoingSemanticElement) {
446                String value = getPropertyValue(connection, getOutgoingReferencePropertyName());
447                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
448                        return null;
449                }
450                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
451                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature(value);
452                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
453                        return (EReference) ref;
454                }
455                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + value + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
456        }
457        
458        protected String getOutgoingInjectorPropertyName() {
459                return "outgoing-injector";
460        }
461        
462        @Override
463        protected void setOutgoing(NodeProcessorConfig<P, ProcessorInfo<P>, ProcessorInfo<P>> config, P processor, Connection connection, ProcessorInfo<P> outgoingProcessorInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
464                super.setOutgoing(config, processor, connection, outgoingProcessorInfo, progressMonitor);               
465                String expr = getPropertyValue(connection, getOutgoingInjectorPropertyName());
466                P outgoingProcessor = outgoingProcessorInfo.getProcessor();
467                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr) && processor != null && outgoingProcessor != null) {
468                        for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
469                                for (T outgoingSemanticElement: outgoingProcessor.getSemanticElements()) {
470                                        ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
471                                        Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
472                                        EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
473                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
474                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
475                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("connection", connection);
476                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("outgoingProcessor", outgoingProcessor);
477                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("outgoingSemanticElement", outgoingSemanticElement);
478                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("outgoingConfig", outgoingProcessorInfo.getConfig());                     
479                                        exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);
480                                }
481                        }
482                }
483        }
484                
485        // Children
486        
487        /**
488         * Value of child references property shall be a YAML map with reference names as keys and boolean Spel expressions as values. 
489         * @return
490         */
491        protected String getChildReferencesPropertyName() {
492                return "child-references";
493        }
494        
495        @Override
496        protected EReference getChildReference(ProcessorConfig<P> config, T semanticElement, Element child,     ProcessorInfo<P> childProcessorInfo, T semanticChild) {
497                if (config == null) {
498                        return null;
499                }
500                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getChildReferencesPropertyName());
501                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
502                        return null;
503                }
504                Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
505                Object yamlValue = yaml.load(value);
506                if (yamlValue instanceof Map) {
507                        Map<?, ?> yamlMap = (Map<?,?>) yamlValue;
508                        for (Entry<?, ?> me: yamlMap.entrySet()) {
509                                Object key = me.getKey();
510                                if (key instanceof String) {
511                                        Object eValue = me.getValue();
512                                        if (eValue instanceof String) {
513                                                ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
514                                                Expression exp = parser.parseExpression((String) eValue);
515                                                EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
516                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentConfig", config);
517                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parent", semanticElement);
518                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("parentElement", config.getElement());
519                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("element", child);
520                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("config", childProcessorInfo.getConfig());
521                                                try {
522                                                        if (exp.getValue(evaluationContext, childProcessorInfo.getProcessor(), Boolean.class)) {
523                                                                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
524                                                                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature((String) key);
525                                                                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
526                                                                        return (EReference) ref;
527                                                                }
528                                                                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + key + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
529                                                        }
530                                                } catch (EvaluationException e) {
531                                                        // NOP - continue
532                                                }
533                                        } else {
534                                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(getChildReferencesPropertyName() + " map values shall be strings, got " + eValue);                                           
535                                        }
536                                } else {
537                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(getChildReferencesPropertyName() + " map keys shall be strings, got " + key);
538                                }
539                        }                                               
540                }
541                throw new IllegalArgumentException(getChildReferencesPropertyName() + " value shall be a YAML map, got " + yamlValue);
542        }
543        
544        protected String getChildInjectorsPropertyName() {
545                return "child-injectors";
546        }
547        
548        @Override
549        protected void setChildren(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, Map<Element, ProcessorInfo<P>> children, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
550                super.setChildren(config, processor, children, progressMonitor);
551                if (config != null && processor != null) {
552                        String expr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getChildInjectorsPropertyName());
553                        if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr)) {
554                                for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
555                                        ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
556                                        Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
557                                        EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
558                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
559                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
560                                        evaluationContext.setVariable("children", children);
561                                        exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);
562                                }
563                        }
564                }
565        }
566        
567        // Registry
568        protected String getRegistryReferencesPropertyName() {
569                return "registry-references";
570        }       
571        
572        @Override
573        protected EReference getRegistryReference(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, T semanticElement, Element registryElement, ProcessorInfo<P> registryElementProcessorInfo, T registrySemanticElement) {               
574                if (registrySemanticElement == null) {
575                        return null;
576                }
577                
578                String value = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getRegistryReferencesPropertyName());
579                if (org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(value)) {
580                        return null;
581                }
582                Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
583                Object yamlValue = yaml.load(value);
584                if (yamlValue instanceof Map) {
585                        Map<?, ?> yamlMap = (Map<?,?>) yamlValue;
586                        for (Entry<?, ?> me: yamlMap.entrySet()) {
587                                Object key = me.getKey();
588                                if (key instanceof String) {
589                                        Object eValue = me.getValue();
590                                        if (eValue instanceof String) {
591                                                ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
592                                                Expression exp = parser.parseExpression((String) eValue);
593                                                EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
594                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
595                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
596                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("registryElement", registryElement);
597                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("registryConfig", registryElementProcessorInfo.getConfig());
598                                                evaluationContext.setVariable("semanticElement", semanticElement);
599                                                try {
600                                                        if (exp.getValue(evaluationContext, registrySemanticElement, Boolean.class)) {
601                                                                EClass eClass = semanticElement.eClass();
602                                                                EStructuralFeature ref = eClass.getEStructuralFeature((String) key);
603                                                                if (ref instanceof EReference) {
604                                                                        return (EReference) ref;
605                                                                }
606                                                                throw new ConfigurationException("Reference '" + key + "' not found in " + eClass.getName() + " " + eClass.getEPackage().getNsURI(), getMarked(config));
607                                                        }
608                                                } catch (EvaluationException e) {
609                                                        // NOP - continue
610                                                }
611                                        } else {
612                                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(getRegistryReferencesPropertyName() + " map values shall be strings, got " + eValue);                                                
613                                        }
614                                } else {
615                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(getRegistryReferencesPropertyName() + " map keys shall be strings, got " + key);
616                                }
617                        }                                               
618                }
619                throw new IllegalArgumentException(getRegistryReferencesPropertyName() + " value shall be a YAML map, got " + yamlValue);
620        }
621
622        protected String getRegistryInjectorsPropertyName() {
623                return "registry-injectors";
624        }
625        
626        @Override
627        protected void setRegistry(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, Map<Element, ProcessorInfo<P>> registry, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
628                super.setRegistry(config, processor, registry, progressMonitor);
629                String expr = getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getRegistryInjectorsPropertyName());
630                if (processor != null && !org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(expr)) {
631                        for (T semanticElement: processor.getSemanticElements()) {
632                                ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
633                                Expression exp = parser.parseExpression(expr);
634                                EvaluationContext evaluationContext = createEvaluationContext();
635                                evaluationContext.setVariable("config", config);
636                                evaluationContext.setVariable("element", config.getElement());
637                                evaluationContext.setVariable("registry", registry);
638                                exp.getValue(evaluationContext, semanticElement);
639                        }
640                }                                                               
641        }       
642
643        protected String getLinkPagePropertyName() {
644                return "link-page";
645        }       
646        
647}
